summary: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.
cast: Kurt Russell|Kim Cattrall|Dennis Dun|James Hong|Victor Wong|Kate Burton|Donald Li|Carter Wong|Peter Kwong|James Pax|Suzee Pai|Chao Li Chi|Jeff Imada|Rummel Mor|Craig Ng|June Kyoto Lu|Noel Toy|Jade Go|Jerry Hardin|James Lew|Jim Lau|Kenny Endoso|Stuart Quan|Gary Toy|George Cheung|Jimmy Jue|Noble Craig|Danny Kwan|Min Luong|Paul J.Q. Noguschi|Shinko Isobe|William B. Snider|John Carpenter|Dawna Lee Heising|Conrad Hurtt|Conan Lee|Leo Lee|Bill Saito|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa
title: Golpe en la pequeña China
